attributes.action: Improve the salaries of all nurses, considering the amount of training they receive and what police staff receive in salary after their training
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
The improvement of Nurses salaries will keep quality staff & assist some of the poorest earners onto the property ladder.
These loving caring people deserve a good wage, caring for all our relatives, whilst dying or injured.

We should support their long and hard dedicated hours with sometimes very difficult type of work and situations

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
